ROW.NAME: 年度行业增值税分析表

ROW.DATDSC: select nvl(name,'其他') 行业,taxmny 增值税,sdtax 所得税 from ( select b.typclsid,c.name,sum(zzs)/[%UNIT] taxmny,sum(sds)/[%UNIT] sdtax from v_tax_kpdata a,v_tax_company b,tax_compclass c where to_char(jkfsrq,'yyyy')=decode('[%YYYY]','',to_char(sysdate,'yyyy'),'[%YYYY]') and nvl(b.stat,' ') <> '注销' and a.nsrsbh=b.id and b.typclsid=c.id(+) [%HYCLS] group by b.typclsid,c.name ) order by typclsid
